title: JD Vance Writes Foreword for Project 2025 Architect's Book
summary: Vice President-elect JD Vance writes the foreword to "Dawn's Early Light" by Kevin Roberts, the architect of Project 2025. In the foreword, Vance calls for "offensive conservatism" and "rebuild[ing]" government, endorsing the Heritage Foundation's blueprint to fire 500,000 federal employees and dismantle agencies. This demonstrates alignment with authoritarian consolidation strategies.
